Hero.title: A complete management platform for tutoring centre
Hero.subtitle: Streamline operations, manage finances, track KPIs, and engage parents‚Äîeverything you need to run a successful tutoring centre

DemoVideo.description: Watch how Edura streamlines class management, automates payments, tracks finances, generates quizzes with AI, and keeps parents engaged through Zalo notifications.

Features.title: Powerful Features for Tutoring Centres
Features.subtitle: All-in-one tools to manage classes, finances, and operations efficiently

studentManagement.title: Class Progress Tracking
studentManagement.description: Monitor student performance, attendance, and class progress in real-time

assignmentCreation.title: AI-Powered Quiz Generation
assignmentCreation.description: Automatically generate quizzes and assessments using intelligent AI

parentCommunication.title: Zalo Parent Notifications
parentCommunication.description: Send instant updates to parents directly via Zalo messaging

scheduleManagement.title: Schedule Management
scheduleManagement.description: Organize classes, sessions, and events seamlessly

performanceAnalytics.title: Auto Grading & KPI Analytics
performanceAnalytics.description: Auto-grade assignments and track key performance indicators

resourceLibrary.title: Financial Management & Payments
resourceLibrary.description: Automate tuition fee collection and track cash flow easily

Pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Pay only for what you use, with the first 100 students completely free
Pricing.planDescription: All features included, pay based on student count

freeTier.title: First 100 Students FREE
freeTier.description: Start with up to 100 students at no cost

Pricing.contactNote: Our team will set up your account and help you get started

guarantee.title: 30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: Try Edura risk-free! If you're not completely satisfied with how our platform helps manage your tutoring centre within the first 30 days, we'll help you resolve any issues or provide a full refund.

Testimonials.title: What Tutoring Centres Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from centre managers and teachers using Edura

emma.name: Linh Nguyen
emma.text: Edura saved us hours every week! The automated payment system and financial reports help us manage cash flow effortlessly.

michael.name: Minh Tran
michael.text: The Zalo integration is a game-changer. Parents receive instant updates, and our enrolment rates have increased significantly.

sophia.name: Hoa Pham
sophia.text: The KPI dashboard gives us real-time visibility into our centre's performance. We can now track student progress and teacher effectiveness easily.

jennifer.name: Duc Hoang
jennifer.text: The AI quiz generation feature saves me so much prep time. Auto-grading means I can focus more on student engagement.

robert.name: Lan Vo
robert.text: Managing multiple classes has never been easier. The platform handles scheduling, grading, and parent communication seamlessly.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Edura
newsletter.subtitle: Get the latest educational tips, course updates, and learning resources delivered to your inbox

Footer.description: Empowering K-12 students worldwide with interactive learning experiences, expert instruction, and personalized educational pathways for academic success.

Contact.title: Get Started with Edura
Contact.subtitle: Contact us to set up your tutoring centre account. Our team will help you get started quickly.

free.title: First 100 Students Free

success.message: Thank you for your interest in Edura. Our team will contact you within 24 hours to set up your account.

AddTeacher.title: Add Teacher
AddTeacher.description: Create a new teacher account. A system-generated password will be created and an email will be sent.
AddTeacher.name: Full Name
AddTeacher.generatedPasswordDescription: Please save this password. The teacher will need it for their first login.
AddTeacher.passwordWarning: Please save this password. It will be sent to the teacher via email, but you should keep a copy for your records.

AddStudent.title: Add Student
AddStudent.description: Create a new student account. A system-generated password will be created and an email will be sent.
AddStudent.name: Full Name
AddStudent.generatedPasswordDescription: Please save this password. The student will need it for their first login.
AddStudent.passwordWarning: Please save this password. It will be sent to the student via email, but you should keep a copy for your records.

CSVImport.title: Import from CSV
CSVImport.importTeachersDesc: Upload a CSV file to create multiple teacher accounts at once.
CSVImport.importStudentsDesc: Upload a CSV file to create multiple student accounts at once.
CSVImport.description: Upload a CSV file to create multiple accounts at once.
CSVImport.csvFormat: CSV format: name, email, dateOfBirth (YYYY-MM-DD). Date of birth is optional.
CSVImport.previewDescription: The following accounts will be created:
CSVImport.name: Name
CSVImport.invalidFormat: Invalid CSV format. Please check the file format.
CSVImport.noDataRows: No data rows found in the CSV file.
CSVImport.noValidRows: No valid rows found in the CSV file.
CSVImport.missingNameColumn: Missing 'name' column in the CSV file.
CSVImport.missingEmailColumn: Missing 'email' column in the CSV file.
CSVImport.passwordWarning: Please save these passwords. They will be sent to the users via email, but you should keep a copy for your records.

PasswordWarning.title: Password Change Required
